de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.math.statistics.distribution.estimator

Interface MADDistributionEstimator<D extends Distribution>

  • Type Parameters:
    D - Distribution estimated.
    All Superinterfaces:
    DistributionEstimator<D>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractMADEstimator, CauchyMADEstimator, ExponentialMADEstimator, ExponentialMedianEstimator, GammaMADEstimator, GumbelMADEstimator, LaplaceMADEstimator, LogisticMADEstimator, LogLogisticMADEstimator, NormalMADEstimator, RayleighMADEstimator, UniformMADEstimator

    public interface MADDistributionEstimator<D extends Distribution>
extends DistributionEstimator<D>
    Distribuition estimators that use the method of moments (MOM), i.e. that only need the statistical moments of a data set.
    Author:
    Erich Schubert

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      General form of the parameter estimation
